tool_description: Formats job posting content according to specific platform requirements and character limits while maintaining key information.

job_content.description: Original job posting content to format

target_platform.description: Target platform: linkedin, indeed, glassdoor, monster, ziprecruiter, company_website, facebook, twitter

preserve_sections.description: Sections that must be preserved: responsibilities, qualifications, benefits, company_info

include_hashtags.description: Whether to include relevant hashtags for social platforms

error_messages: Invalid target platform: Must be one of [linkedin, indeed, glassdoor, monster, ziprecruiter, company_website, facebook, twitter].
Empty job content: Provide valid job posting content to format.
Invalid preserve sections: Sections must be from [responsibilities, qualifications, benefits, company_info].
Content too long: Even after formatting, content exceeds platform limits and cannot be properly formatted.
usage: Provide job content and specify target platform. Optionally preserve specific sections and add custom elements. The tool will format according to platform specifications and best practices.

formatted_content.description: Content formatted for the target platform

character_count.description: Final character count of formatted content

platform_limit.description: Character limit for the target platform

sections_included.description: List of sections included in final format

hashtags_added.description: Hashtags added for social media platforms
